Value.label: Lock Mode - unlocking sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to activate Lock Mode and set up unlocking sequence. Device will lock after time set in parameter 2 or after pressing and holding selected button. 0 - Lock Mode disabled. 9-28086 - unlocking sequence. See "Lock Mode" on page 9 for more information.

Value.label: Lock Mode - time to lock and locking button
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set time that must elapse from the last press of the button to lock the device and locking button. Setting locking button will deactivate associations and scenes for pressing and holding the selected button. This parameter is irrelevant if parameter 1 is set to 0 (Lock Mode disable). 0 - Lock Mode disabled. 5-1791- calculated value. See "Lock Mode" on page 9 for more information

Value.label: First scene sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set up sequence that activates scene with ID 7. 0 - 1st sequence disabled. 9-28086 - value of sequence. See "Sequences" on page 10 for more information.

Value.label: Second scene sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set up sequence that activates scene with ID 8. 0 - 1st sequence disabled. 9-28086 - value of sequence. See "Sequences" on page 10 for more information.

Value.label: Third scene sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set up sequence that activates scene with ID 9. 0 - 1st sequence disabled. 9-28086 - value of sequence. See "Sequences" on page 10 for more information.

Value.label: Fourth scene sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set up sequence that activates scene with ID 10. 0 - 1st sequence disabled. 9-28086 - value of sequence. See "Sequences" on page 10 for more information.

Value.label: Fifth scene sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set up sequence that activates scene with ID 11. 0 - 1st sequence disabled. 9-28086 - value of sequence. See "Sequences" on page 10 for more information.

Value.label: Sixth scene sequence
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set up sequence that activates scene with ID 12. 0 - 1st sequence disabled. 9-28086 - value of sequence. See "Sequences" on page 10 for more information.

Value.label: Sequences - timeout
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set time that must elapse from the last press of the button to check if the sequence is valid. Available settings: 5-30 (0.5-3s, 0.1s step) - time to lock

Value.label: Single button associations - operating mode
Value.Help: This parameter allows to choose operating mode for single button associations.

Item.label: Single press switches state to opposite
Single press switches state to opposite, double press sets to maximum level
Single press turns on, double press turns off

Value.label: Value sent to Square association group
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set value sent to devices in association group. It will result in turning multilevel devices on with set or last level. Value is irrelevant for simple on/off devices. Available settings: 1-99 or 255.

Value.label: Value sent to Circle association group
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set value sent to devices in association group. It will result in turning multilevel devices on with set or last level. Value is irrelevant for simple on/off devices. Available settings: 1-99 or 255.

Value.label: Value sent to Cross association group
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set value sent to devices in association group. It will result in turning multilevel devices on with set or last level. Value is irrelevant for simple on/off devices. Available settings: 1-99 or 255.

Value.label: Value sent to Triangle association group
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set value sent to devices in association group. It will result in turning multilevel devices on with set or last level. Value is irrelevant for simple on/off devices. Available settings: 1-99 or 255.

Value.label: Value sent to Minus association group
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set value sent to devices in association group. It will result in turning multilevel devices on with set or last level. Value is irrelevant for simple on/off devices. Available settings: 1-99 or 255.

Value.label: Value sent to Plus association group
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set value sent to devices in association group. It will result in turning multilevel devices on with set or last level. Value is irrelevant for simple on/off devices. Available settings: 1-99 or 255.

Value.label: Paired buttons association for Square and Circle
Value.Help: This parameter allows to activate paired buttons association mode for Square and Circle buttons. Paired buttons are dependent and association are sent only to Square groups. Circle turns devices on and increases value, Square turns them off and decreases value.

Value.label: Paired buttons association for Cross and Triangle
Value.Help: This parameter allows to activate paired buttons association mode for Cross and Triangle buttons. Paired buttons are dependent and association are sent only to Cross groups. Triangle turns devices on and increases value, Cross turns them off and decreases value.

Value.label: Paired buttons association for Minus and Plus
Value.Help: This parameter allows to activate paired buttons association mode for Minus and Plus buttons. Paired buttons are dependent and association are sent only to Minus groups. Plus turns devices on and increases value, Minus turns them off and decreases value.

Value.label: Scene activation for Square button
Value.Help: This parameter determines which actions result in sending assigned scene IDs and attributes to the controller. 1 - Key Pressed 1 time. 2 - Key Pressed 2 times. 4 - Key Pressed 3 times. 8 - Key Held Down and Released. Default setting: 9, 1x and hold.

Value.label: Scene activation for Circle button
Value.Help: This parameter determines which actions result in sending assigned scene IDs and attributes to the controller. 1 - Key Pressed 1 time. 2 - Key Pressed 2 times. 4 - Key Pressed 3 times. 8 - Key Held Down and Released. Default setting: 9, 1x and hold.

Value.label: Scene activation for Cross button
Value.Help: This parameter determines which actions result in sending assigned scene IDs and attributes to the controller. 1 - Key Pressed 1 time. 2 - Key Pressed 2 times. 4 - Key Pressed 3 times. 8 - Key Held Down and Released. Default setting: 9, 1x and hold.

Value.label: Scene activation for Triangle button
Value.Help: This parameter determines which actions result in sending assigned scene IDs and attributes to the controller. 1 - Key Pressed 1 time. 2 - Key Pressed 2 times. 4 - Key Pressed 3 times. 8 - Key Held Down and Released. Default setting: 9, 1x and hold.

Value.label: Scene activation for Minus button
Value.Help: This parameter determines which actions result in sending assigned scene IDs and attributes to the controller. 1 - Key Pressed 1 time. 2 - Key Pressed 2 times. 4 - Key Pressed 3 times. 8 - Key Held Down and Released. Default setting: 9, 1x and hold.

Value.label: Scene activation for Plus button
Value.Help: This parameter determines which actions result in sending assigned scene IDs and attributes to the controller. 1 - Key Pressed 1 time. 2 - Key Pressed 2 times. 4 - Key Pressed 3 times. 8 - Key Held Down and Released. Default setting: 9, 1x and hold.

Value.label: Associations in Z-Wave network Security Mode
Value.Help: Parameter defines how commands are sent in specified association groups: using Security Mode or not. Parameter is active only in Z-Wave network Security Mode. It does not apply to 1st Lifeline association group. 1 : 2nd group sent using Security Mode. 2 : 3rd group sent using Security Mode. 4 : 4th group sent using Security Mode. 8 : 5th group sent using Security Mode. 16 : 6th group sent using Security Mode. 32 : 7th group sent using Security Mode. 64 : 8th group sent using Security Mode. 128 : 9th group sent using Security Mode. 256 : 10th group sent using Security Mode. 512 : 11th group sent using Security Mode. 1024 : 12th group sent using Security Mode. 2048 : 13th group sent using Security Mode.
